summary.address: F-1,The Mira Corporate Suites, 1 & 2, Ishwar Nagr, Mathura Rd, NEW DELHI, 110065, India
summary.overview: India Grid Trust is an India-based infrastructure investment trust. The Investment objectives of the Trust are to undertake activity as an infrastructure investment trust in accordance with the provisions of the infrastructure investment trust (InvIT) Regulations. The investment of the Trust shall be in infrastructure special purpose vehicles or infrastructure projects or securities of Indian companies in accordance with the provisions of the InvIT Regulations. The Trust is focused on providing stable and sustainable distributions to its unit holders. The Investment manager for the Trust is Sterlite Infraventures Limited.
